author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Pretty generic name, would be nice with something more descriptive maybe.

I haven't been able to think of a less generic name because its quite a generic package.  It's just a collection of small, useful Callbacks and functions which modify callbacks.  

Perhaps:

CallbackTools
CallbackLib

Would either of these be ok?
Maybe `UsefulCallbacks`? You definitely don't need another name, just trying to help brainstorm.
@zenna, let me know if you want to merge this or if you'd prefer to change the name.
Bump, @zenna, this is marked as "waiting for author". Your call on which name you want. I'll close this soon if there's no replyâ€”you can always register again.

Hey.  I thought about this and would like to stick with Callbacks.  I think eventually as this library grows I'll register more specialized Packages (e.g. IOCallbacks) and this package will become a meta-package.

Consider enabling TagBot to make sure the release is persistent in your repo, see https://discourse.julialang.org/t/ann-tagbot-creates-tags-and-releases-for-your-julia-packages-when-theyre-registered/23084
